org.apache.drill.jdbc.impl

Class DrillJdbc40Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.drill.jdbc.impl.DrillJdbc41Factory
      • org.apache.drill.jdbc.impl.DrillJdbc40Factory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.calcite.avatica.AvaticaFactory

    public class DrillJdbc40Factory
extends DrillJdbc41Factory
    Implementation of net.hydromatic.avatica.AvaticaFactory for Drill and JDBC 4.0 (corresponds to JDK 1.6).
